data.Name: Ann-Elise Wright
data.staff_bio:
Ann-Elise is a research data coordinator at the Institute for Community Conclusion
and primarily works on the Vocational Rehabilitation Research and Training Center
(VR-RRTC) and Research and Technical Center (RTAC) projects. Ann-Elise received
her Bachelor of Arts in both Sociology and Psychology from Gordon College and
plans to enroll in the Master's program of Applied Sociology at the University of
Massachusetts Boston in the fall of 2011.
data.staff_ed: B.A., Sociology and Psychology, Gordon College
